sentences.en: AIM: To discuss the effect of orbit - orb connection using silicone tube in treating angle paralytic strabismus.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为探索用硅胶管作眶—球连接术治疗麻痹性斜视的疗效.

sentences.en: Are virus infection and shellfish Er paralytic concern?
sentences.cn: 病毒感染与贝尔氏麻痹有关 吗 ?

sentences.en: By the end of the evening they were all absolutely paralytic.
sentences.cn: 晚上结束时，他们全都酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: Clinical expression cent: It is violent model, 2 it is paralytic model.
sentences.cn: 临床表现分两型: 一是狂暴型, 二是麻痹型.

sentences.en: Does finger lose consciousness ( be paralytic probably ) to do?
sentences.cn: 手指失去知觉 ( 大概是麻痹 ) 怎么办 啊 ?

sentences.en: Gas - fluid levels may be seen in paralytic ileus.
sentences.cn: 麻痹性肠梗阻可出现液气平.

sentences.en: It is often difficult radiographicallly to distinguish paralytic ileus from mechanical obstruction.
sentences.cn: 用x光片鉴别麻痹性肠梗阻和机械性肠梗阻通常很难.

sentences.en: Mk .2:5 And Jesus, seeing their faith, said to the paralytic, Child, your sins are forgiven.
sentences.cn: 可二5耶稣见他们的信心, 就对瘫子说, 孩子, 你的罪赦了.

sentences.en: Paralytic Shellfish Posoning show very strong toxicity when compared with other low molecular weight toxin.
sentences.cn: 麻痹性贝毒是一种低分子量、高毒性的贝毒,生存于海洋微藻中.

sentences.en: Paralytic Shellfish Posoning show very strong toxicity when compared with other lowmolecular weight toxin.
sentences.cn: 麻痹性贝毒是一种低分子量、毒性的贝毒,生存于海洋微藻中.

sentences.en: She was / got completely paralytic last night.
sentences.cn: 她昨天晚上喝得酩酊大醉.

sentences.en: Tender bite and touch made him paralytic and brought him on fire.
sentences.cn: 温柔的轻咬和触摸让他感到麻痹,身体仿佛着了火.

sentences.en: The paralytic lingered out several more years.
sentences.cn: 这个瘫痪病人又挨过了好几年.

sentences.en: Violent model: Cent period, prodromal stage, excitement period and paralytic period.
sentences.cn: 狂暴型:分 三期, 前驱期 、 兴奋期和麻痹期.

sentences.en: We were able to reverse paralytic disease in laboratory animals.
sentences.cn: 我们能够在实验室动物身上改变瘫痪疾病.

words.tran_cn: 使麻痹；使无力；使失去勇气（paralyze的过去分词）
